title: Action RPG Music Collection
description: 30+ Original Orchestral Music Themes, 20+ Lite Versions (Ambient, Atmospheric), 70+ Loops = 3+ Hours of Music!
longDescription:
This music collection gives you 3 great Video Game Music Packs for an amazing price! This Bundle will provide a great combination of music for your Game, from soft emotional music to epic battle music. If you have bought this bundle and there is an upgraded version of any of the included packs, you will get those tracks for free!


30+ Original Orchestral Music Themes

20+ Lite Versions (Ambient & Atmospheric)

70+ Loops

3 Hours of Music



This bundle includes the following packs

The Adventurer

The Warrior

Open World


Listen to the packs here:

The Adventurer (Youtube)

The Warrior (Youtube)

Open World (Youtube)


The Adventurer (Soundcloud)

The Warrior (Soundcloud)

Open World (Soundcloud)


Sounds like

Manor Lords

Farthest Frontier

Banished

Foundation

Dark Souls

Elder Scrolls

World of Warcraft

The Witcher

God of War


Youtube-Safe Music

My music is Youtube-Safe and can be freely used without any concerns of copyright strikes, flags, or demonetization. This is essential when players showcase your game in videos or streams for YouTube, and other similar platforms.


You will not get a copyright claim and you are allowed to use the soundtracks wherever you want and as many times as you need Royalty-Free! Use the music over and over, in any of your projects or productions, without any additional fees.


The music is written, produced, mixed and mastered by me and I’m not using AI in any way while creating my music. My music is 100% made by me.


Instructions

Since I don’t know how much intensity and sound effects that you will use in each particular scene I have made “Lite” and “Full” versions. The Lite versions have minimal melodies and are more background-music-like, the Full versions are with all the intended instruments. A bonus is that you can use this to extend the track and get more variations by using the "lite" version first, then transition into the "full" version and then back to the lite version.


The loops are arranged after length and can be used as they are, put in a row, or put together in a lot of different combinations using the software of your choice. There is free software that can be used for this as well.


About Me

I’m an independent music composer that loves to write music for the orchestra. My goal is to offer high quality music at an affordable price and make you get a lifetime of value from it through Free Lifetime Updates.


It’s you as a game developer or editor that will be my customer (hopefully) and I want my music to serve your project as well as possible. Let me know if you have any questions or suggestions. I’m also interested in hearing about the game/project that you used my music for if I may. I will give you a shout out if you like!


Thank you so much for supporting me and my music!
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Wavs: 133

Number of Audio Cues: 133

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1 Hz / 16-bit

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 180 minutes


Supported Development Platforms:

  • Windows: Yes
  • Mac: Yes
  • Any: Yes
